How to torrent #

Why Bittorrent? #

  • Most popular filesharing method worldwide.
  • Shares files in a web, instead of single uploader.
  • Can find most movies, shows, music, and books, for free.
  • Once seeded, impossible to take down.

Get a VPN #

  • ISPs watch what you download.
  • Hides your traffic from your ISP.
  • Protects you using tunneling and encryption.

Find a Torrent Client #

  • qBittorrent
  • Deluge
  • Flud (Android)

Find a Torrent Search Engine #

  • Use Google

Find a Media Player #

  • VLC

Next steps #

  • Get a media server like Plex for a Netflix-like experience.
  • Get a remote controller for your torrent machine like qBittorrent Controller
↩
↪
Have fun and explore
